Turin's cafÃ© culture goes back to the 18th century and the House of Savoy. And this is its quentessential pick-me-upper - 'bicerin' - a warm multilayered drink of cream, coffee & chocolate. And there's no shortage of old skool cafÃ©s in town to try it..â˜• #coffee #chocolate #cafe https://t.co/M16PKJLm60

Turin's association with cars began way before 'The Italian Job', being the centre of the Italian car industry. And the Museo dell'Automobile is a treat not just for petrolheads.
